data:
## constant_createDrawer
> `const` **createDrawer**: [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`DrawerWidget`](#drawerwidget)\>


Create a Drawer widget with given config props

### Param

an optional Drawer config

### Returns

a DrawerWidget

## interface_DrawerApi

Interface representing the API for a Drawer component.

### Properties

#### close

> **close**: () => `void`


Trigger the closing of the drawer.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**: () => `void`


Trigger the opening of the drawer.

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_DrawerDirectives

Interface representing various directives used in the Drawer component.

### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### backdropPortalDirective

> **backdropPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### containerDirective

> **containerDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the container DOM element in order for the drawer to size correctly.

***

#### drawerDirective

> **drawerDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the drawer DOM element.

***

#### drawerPortalDirective

> **drawerPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Portal directive to put on the drawer DOM element.

***

#### splitterDirective

> **splitterDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


Directive to put on the splitter DOM element.

## type alias_DrawerPositions
> **DrawerPositions** = `"inline-start"` \| `"inline-end"` \| `"block-start"` \| `"block-end"`


Possible values for the drawer positions

## interface_DrawerProps

Interface representing the properties for the Drawer component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


If `true` opening and closing will be animated.

***

#### ariaDescribedBy

> **ariaDescribedBy**: `string`


aria-describedby attribute to use for the drawer element.

***

#### ariaLabelledBy

> **ariaLabelledBy**: `string`


aria-labelledby attribute to use for the drawer element.

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`


If `true` displays the backdrop element and disables the body scrolling, otherwise the body of the document is navigable

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition to use for the backdrop behind the drawer (if present).

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### bodyScroll

> **bodyScroll**: `boolean`


If `true` allows body scrolling when the drawer is open.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the drawer and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the drawer and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### height

> **height**: `number`


The height of the drawer in pixels.

***

#### onHeightChange

> **onHeightChange**: (`width`) => `void`


An event emitted when the height is changed.

Event payload is equal to the newly selected height.

##### Parameters

###### width

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the drawer is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`


Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the drawer is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`


Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onWidthChange

> **onWidthChange**: (`width`) => `void`


An event emitted when the width is changed.

Event payload is equal to the newly selected width.

##### Parameters

###### width

`number`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### resizable

> **resizable**: `boolean`


If `true`, the drawer can be resized by the user.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition function will be executed when the drawer is displayed or hidden.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### verticalTransition

> **verticalTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition function for vertically positioned drawer (top, bottom) that will be executed when the drawer is displayed or hidden.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


If `true`, the drawer is shown; otherwise, it is hidden.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### width

> **width**: `number`


The width of the drawer in pixels.

## interface_DrawerState

Represents the state of a Drawer component.

### Properties

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`


Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`


Whether the backdrop is fully hidden. This can be true either because [backdrop](#drawerprops-backdrop) is false or
because [visible](#drawerprops-visible) is false and there is no current transition.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)


Which element should contain the drawer and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the drawer and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`


Flag to show whether the drawer is fully hidden.

***

#### resizable

> **resizable**: `boolean`


If `true`, the drawer can be resized by the user.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


If `true`, the drawer is shown; otherwise, it is hidden.

##### Default Value

`false`

## type alias_DrawerWidget
> **DrawerWidget** = [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`DrawerProps`](#drawerprops), [`DrawerState`](#drawerstate), [`DrawerApi`](#drawerapi), [`DrawerDirectives`](#drawerdirectives)\>


Represents a Drawer widget component.

## function_getDrawerDefaultConfig
> **getDrawerDefaultConfig**(): [`DrawerProps`](#drawerprops)


Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Drawer config

### Returns

[`DrawerProps`](#drawerprops)

the default Drawer config
